text: Thats not remote given the projectef pork shortage because of the ASF outbreak in china, asia anf europe.
author: MannyPiñol

text: Thank you sir.. speaking of asf, lets continue to work hand n hand para ma prevent pg pasok ng asf at ibang sakit na mka pigil mg export ng agri products natin.. Godbless you sir and you’re Department.. 👍👍👍
author: Leonilo Jr Go

text: MannyPiñol  sir its true it's not easy to export meat to germany or Europe. . But i notice a new trend in  Europe or germany  itself , people are very conscious of healthy living.a lot cut their consumption of meat, I'm one of them too. A lot of vegan products are now sold ... And i found something that might be interesting to Philippine farmers. Jackfruit unripe in chunks are being sold here for vegans .. the store where i bought it is a chain huge company in whole Germany. I myself stirfry it with tofu..and spices.. Really very delicious. THe thing is i remember that in phil.we have also breadfruit...which for sure also when unriped can be used as meat substitute.   If only i could post foto here ,cause i took picture of it to show you sir @Manny Piñiol
author: Lilieae Ripplinger

text: It is interesting to know that it was made possible by a Filipino journalist. Wow!Filipinos are now helping the government despite the active movement of destabilizers and disruptors. But they will not prevail. Hangga't may MannyPiñol sa DA, who is selflessly and whole-heartedly serving the country, mas lalong tumitibay ang pundasyon. It's another achievement on the part of Dept. of Agriculture. Farmers are now a lot happier. Buhayin ang agrikultura sa bansa! Go Piñol! Go DA! 💪👍👏👊

text: Sec MannyPiñol, if the farmers are planning to build cold storage facilities, solarize it and run in tandem with grid power. In this way, they can save on their power bill. If the place doesn't have grid power, they can still use solar energy directly without the need of energy storage.

Huwag iasa at isisi sa gobyerno ang lahat ng nangyayari sa atin God bless people from DA.  Carmen Farmers Agri Coop

text: Daniel Galang pardon sir? Who are you to tell that? Yung iba nga presidente lng ng purok sa probinsya di magawa yung tungkulin nila,  yan pa kayang mging DA secretary na?Nobody's perfect!He is trying his best to make a remarkable change sa larangan ng Argrikultura ng Pilipinas! Wag kang mag focus sa isang pgkakamali ng tao at balewalain yung magagandang nagawa nya!  Wag kang masyadong perfect magsalita sir. Try to put yourself in his shoes para alam mo yung pressure at hirap! Instead of bashing and commenting harsh words, please do encourage him to do good.. Mas ma inspire pa yan.. Do not apply here the so called "crab mentality "..Your comment/opinion is highly recognized but not appreciated!No offense meant sir.

author: Abu Omar Tumbaga

text: Unawain na lang natin na short-sighted ang ibang kababayan natin. They cannot comprehend things beyond their farm and their harvests.  Para sa kanila, mataas na bilihan lang ang importante, it doesn't matter kung may demand o wala, and it doesn't matter kung panandalian lang ang benepisyo.  DA Secretary MUST think beyond that - maraming dapat i-consider. Yung supply, yung demand, yung mechanism to move goods around, yung relasyon natin sa mga karatig-bansa, yung mga legislation, etc.  Hindi kayang i-process ng iba ang mga ganitong bagay.
author: Ramer Ortega

text: Mitch Guillermo Cuevas on point!give credits of what is being brought and encourage him,not complain..show support..kasi,step by step nmn yan eh..uunahin ang may progresong proyekto.hanggang sa maisaayos ang pinakakomplikado..ilang beses na nyang sinabi na some products ay hawak ng world market so sa puntong un,wala talaga syang power..🙄

text: sana nmn pagtuonan din ng pansin ang nangyari sa kopra at palayan sec pinol ..kopra at palay ang pangunahing kabuhayan namin d2 sa davao or ..masaya na kamisa mga nagawa ng prrd peeo nakakalungkot isipin na ang presyo ng mga produkto namin ay ang baba ..kopra at palay ay halos magkapareho na tag 17 per kilo ..kumpara sa presyo na 20 non ..malaki po ang  nabawas samin .. ok lng sana yan kung ang presyo ng fertilizer at pesticides ay baba rin pero kada taon itong ng increase ..pano nyo kami matuungan jan ..macontrol.ba ninyo ang presyo ng abono at pestisidyo o may ipamimigay kayo na abono at pestisidyo para sa mga magsasaka na tulad namin na mga small.scale.farmers ..
author: Richard Calapuan
